name: Test a push hook
description:
**Note:** GitHub Enterprise release 2.17 and higher will discontinue allowing admins to install new GitHub Services, and existing services will stop working in GitHub Enterprise release 2.20 and higher. You can use the [Replacing GitHub Services guide](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.16/v3/guides/replacing-github-services) to help you update your services to webhooks.

This will trigger the hook with the latest push to the current repository if the hook is subscribed to `push` events. If the hook is not subscribed to `push` events, the server will respond with 204 but no test POST will be generated.

**Note**: Previously `/repos/:owner/:repo/hooks/:hook_id/test`
